## General info
I made a simple Node Express App  using HTTP utility methods ,create a server side, render client using ###PUG 
![Algorithm schema](./image/schema.jpg)
## Technologies
Project is created with :
* "express": "^4.17.1",
* "pug": "^3.0.0"
* "browser-sync": "^2.26.12",
* "nodemon": "^2.0.4"
* 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Ubuntu:500'(API)
## Setup
To run this project ,install it locally using npm ,choose one because there is two projects:
```
$ cd ../[name=]
$ npm install
$ npm  start
$ npm run start
$ npm run ui
```
